About Me

Hello! I'm Cristian Orozco started my professional career as a Business Manager and actually I'm reinventing myself as a front end developer.

I like to be self-taught, lover of good design and create things with which we can interact.

I am a continuous learner. Learning for me equates to exploring new ideas and growing as an individual. I just cannot imagine my life devoid of designing. I freely express my creativity and imagination by designing.
